definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: Buy hormone free meats to eat.
sentences.chinese: 購買不含賀爾蒙的肉類。

sentences.english: Juan Guarda Tempranillo is excellent with meat, cheese and Italian dishes.
sentences.chinese: 最適合佐餐肉類，奶酪和意大利美食。

sentences.english: Imported meat products must come from non-epizootic disease countries or regions.
sentences.chinese: 進口的肉類產品應來自無動物疫病流行的國家或地區。

sentences.english: The risk of animal zoonoses is perhaps the biggest cause of public concern with meat.
sentences.chinese: 人畜共患病風險可能是公衆對肉類關注的最主要原因。

sentences.english: Close the lid and turn the knob to pork cooking cycle to stew about 15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 蓋上蓋子，調至肉類檔位燜煮大約15分鐘。

sentences.english: Meat is, at best, a secondary source of essential elements.
sentences.chinese: 肉類充其量不過是身體基本要素的次要來源。

sentences.english: Undigested meat remaining in the intestines become putrified and leads to more toxic buildup.
sentences.chinese: 未消化的肉類留在腸內，會變成成毒性物質。

sentences.english: In China it has risen from 4kg to 54.
sentences.chinese: 中國肉類的人均年消費量從僅4千克達到了54千克。

sentences.english: The number of animals farmed for food should be cut by almost a third, experts recommended.
sentences.chinese: 專家們建議生產肉類的動物農場應該削減三分之一。

sentences.english: Drink anytime, or to accompany roast chicken and other white meats.
sentences.chinese: 此酒可獨飲，搭配烤雞肉等白肉類亦佳。

sentences.english: The inspection is usually carried out by designated veterinarians or meat inspectors at the abattoir.
sentences.chinese: 檢驗通常由指定的獸醫或肉類檢驗員在屠宰廠進行。

sentences.english: These heterocyclic amines and some other carcinogens too are very often found in meat products.
sentences.chinese: 在肉類產品中也會經常發現多環胺和其它一些致癌物。

sentences.english: The putrid odor of rotting meat flooded the corridors.
sentences.chinese: 腐爛的肉類腐爛的氣味充斥走廊。

sentences.english: To julienne meat means to cut the meat into very thin slices.
sentences.chinese: 要切絲的肉類切成薄片的肉非常。

sentences.english: When I was ten I began to find meat too fatty.
sentences.chinese: 當我十歲的時候我發現肉類很肥膩。

sentences.english: People can also become infected by consuming undercooked meat.
sentences.chinese: 人們同樣可以經由食用未煮熟的肉類而感染。

definition: to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
